entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 5.
